basics.name: Jeannie Ramelb
basics.label: Insurance Professional
basics.summary:
Aloha! I am a full-time Associate Account Manager at an insurance agency on Maui. On the side, I am exploring software development, database design, visualizing data by taking Coursera courses by the University of Michigan. I'd like to someday go back to school for Computer Science and marry my passion in insurance and love for technology. I obtained my B.A. in both Mathematics and German from University of Hawaii at Manoa in May 2018.
Disclaimer: This page is still under construction!

courses: Introduction to Programming (Free Version of Matlab 'Scilab' and Fortran)

highlights: Provide assistance and support to Account Managers in maintaining, expanding, and servicing commercial accounts
Investigate and process property claims, interview witnesses, claimants, and policy holders, secure facts and assess credibility
Negotiate with claimants, prepare and present claims, work with adverse carrier adjusters to come to liability stance
Participate in underwriting, risk management, premium audit, and casualty insurance seminars and classes
Tutor courses from Math 100-253 (Survey of Mathematics, Precalculus, Trig, Applied Calculus, Calculus for Business and Social Sciences, and Calculus 1-4
Grade students' homework assignments and assist professors with grading exams and inputting grades

work.company: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Mathematics Department
highlights: Attend  two meeting a week each for 90 minutes
Help the instructor and students during class times

work.company: TS Restaurants Management, Inc. - Kimo's Maui Restaurant
highlights: Manage the seating area, take reservations over the phone and in person, clearing and setting up tables, resolve conflicts  as they arise in the work environment and put customers at ease
Take daily inventory, assist customers with selection by offering suggestions and opinions, advise customers by providing information on products, document sales
Maintain membership records, record attendance, and maintain minutes of club and board meetings
Remove trash and care for land near Heiau at Wai Ki Kena on a County coastal preserve

volunteer.organization: Rotaract Club at the University of Hawaii at Manoa
volunteer.position: President, Secretary/Treasurer, Relay for Life Team Captain, Active Member
volunteer.summary: Conduct club and board meetings, organize guest speakers, organize community service events, write and submit grants to university's funding boards, work in close liaison with community service and organization contacts, work in close liaison with community Rotary members

volunteer.organization: German Club at the University of Hawaii at Manoa
volunteer.summary: Conduct club and board meetings, write and submit grants to university's funding boards, work in close liaison with community members, conduct German social events, organize semester-end banquets
